trans-unit.source: Implements a structure that is used to describe the Size of an object.
trans-unit.target: 實作結構，用來描述物件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Size is particularly useful because it describes both the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A> of an object.
trans-unit.target: 大小是特別有用，因為它會說明兩者<xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A>的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Size is used extensively by the layout system to arrange and measure elements.
trans-unit.target: 大小可廣泛由配置系統來排列及測量項目。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *width* A value greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the of the Size structure.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*寬度*值大於或等於 0，指定大小結構。

trans-unit.source: *height* A value greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> of the Size structure.
trans-unit.target: *高度*值大於或等於 0，指定<xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>大小結構。</xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the structure and assigns it an initial width and height.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體結構，並將其指派初始 width 和 height 。

trans-unit.source: The `width` and `height` cannot be negative.
trans-unit.target: `width`和`height`不能為負數。

trans-unit.source: The initial width of the instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的初始寬度<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The initial height of the instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的初始高度<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents a static empty <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，代表靜態空白<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> of the instance of <xref:System.Windows.Size> are equal to negative-infinity when this property is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Size>叫用這個屬性時，會等於負無限大。</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is the only situation where <xref:System.Windows.Size> can be a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 這是唯一的狀況其中<xref:System.Windows.Size>可以是負數。</xref:System.Windows.Size>

trans-unit.source: An empty instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 空的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares an object to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較物件的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Double> values can result in an error when operated upon.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>值可能會導致錯誤時在其上作業。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Values that are logically equal might fail to result in a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯上相等的值可能會失敗所造成的值為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>比較。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the sizes are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果大小相等;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares a value to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for equality.
trans-unit.target: 將執行個體的值相比較<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Double> values can result in an error when operated upon.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>值可能會導致錯誤時在其上作業。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Values that are logically equal might fail to result in a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯上相等的值可能會失敗所造成的值為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The size to compare to this current instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的目前執行個體大小<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>相等; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Double> values can result in an error when operated upon.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>值可能會導致錯誤時在其上作業。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Values that are logically equal might fail to result in a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯上相等的值可能會失敗所造成的值為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>比較。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>比較。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>相等; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體的雜湊程式碼<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的雜湊碼<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Height of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個執行個體的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Height of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The value cannot be negative.
trans-unit.target: 值不可為負數。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> is <xref:System.Windows.Size.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否此執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>為<xref:System.Windows.Size.Empty*>。</xref:System.Windows.Size.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Even if <xref:System.Windows.Size> is 0, the instance of <xref:System.Windows.Size> will still contain a 0 or 1, indicating a zero- or one-dimensional set of points.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Windows.Size>為 0，執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Size>仍然會包含為 0 或 1，指出零或一次性維度一組點。</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Size>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, do not use this property to check for a 0 area.
trans-unit.target: 因此，請勿使用這個屬性檢查 0 區域。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance of size is <xref:System.Windows.Size.Empty*>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個執行個體大小的<xref:System.Windows.Size.Empty*>，否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Size.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>比較。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>比較。

trans-unit.source: true if the two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> are equal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: true，否則兩個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>相等，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>不相等，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> from a converted <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>從轉換過的<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value to parse to a <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>值剖析到<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來格式化值提供者。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體中指定的格式的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents this <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>，這代表<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A> property is set to 30 and the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> property is set to 40, the ToString method returns a string that says `"30, 40"`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A>屬性設定為 30，<xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>屬性設定為 40，ToString 方法會傳回字串，指出`"30, 40"`。</xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the width followed by the height.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>指定後面接著高度的寬度。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>，代表這個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a way to control formatting.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法來控制格式設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents this <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，這代表<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Width of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個執行個體的寬度<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Width of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的寬度<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `0`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `0`。

trans-unit.source: The value cannot be negative.
trans-unit.target: 值不可為負數。
